data.title: Bluesky Social

tools.title: Check Auth Status
tools.description: Check if the current session is authenticated.

tools.title: Get Profile
tools.description: Get a user profile.

fields.title: Handle
fields.caption: Optional handle to get profile for. If None, gets the authenticated user

tools.title: Get Follows
tools.description: Get users followed by an account.

fields.title: Handle
fields.caption: Optional handle to get follows for. If None, gets the authenticated user

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

tools.title: Get Followers
tools.description: Get users who follow an account.

fields.title: Handle
fields.caption: Optional handle to get followers for. If None, gets the authenticated user

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

tools.title: Like Post
tools.description: Like a post.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to like

fields.title: Cid
fields.caption: CID of the post to like

tools.title: Unlike Post
tools.description: Unlike a previously liked post.

fields.title: Like Uri
fields.caption: URI of the like.

tools.title: Send Post
tools.description: Send a post to Bluesky.

fields.title: Text
fields.caption: Text content of the post

fields.title: Profile Identify
fields.caption: Optional handle or DID. Where to send post. If not provided, sends to current profile

fields.title: Reply To
fields.caption: Optional reply reference with 'root' and 'parent' containing 'uri' and 'cid'

fields.title: Embed
fields.caption: Optional embed object (images, external links, records, or video)

fields.title: Langs
fields.caption: Optional list of language codes used in the post (defaults to ['en'])

fields.title: Facets
fields.caption: Optional list of rich text facets (mentions, links, etc.)

tools.title: Repost
tools.description: Repost another user's post.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to repost

fields.title: Cid
fields.caption: CID of the post to repost

tools.title: Unrepost
tools.description: Remove a repost of another user's post.

fields.title: Repost Uri
fields.caption: URI of the repost to remove

tools.title: Get Likes
tools.description: Get likes for a post.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to get likes for

fields.title: Cid
fields.caption: Optional CID of the post (not strictly required)

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

tools.title: Get Reposted By
tools.description: Get users who reposted a post.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to get reposts for

fields.title: Cid
fields.caption: Optional CID of the post (not strictly required)

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

tools.title: Get Post
tools.description: Get a specific post.

fields.title: Post Rkey
fields.caption: The record key of the post

fields.title: Profile Identify
fields.caption: Handle or DID of the post author

fields.title: Cid
fields.caption: Optional CID of the post

tools.title: Get Posts
tools.description: Get multiple posts by their URIs.

fields.title: Uris
fields.caption: List of post URIs to retrieve

tools.title: Get Timeline
tools.description: Get posts from your home timeline.

fields.title: Algorithm
fields.caption: Optional algorithm to use for timeline

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return

tools.title: Get Author Feed
tools.description: Get posts from a specific user.

fields.title: Actor
fields.caption: Handle or DID of the user

fields.title: Cursor
fields.caption: Optional pagination cursor

fields.title: Filter
fields.caption: Optional filter for post types

fields.title: Limit
fields.caption: Maximum number of results to return

fields.title: Include Pins
fields.caption: Whether to include pinned posts

tools.title: Get Post Thread
tools.description: Get a full conversation thread.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to get thread for

fields.title: Depth
fields.caption: How many levels of replies to include

fields.title: Parent Height
fields.caption: How many parent posts to include

tools.title: Resolve Handle
tools.description: Resolve a handle to a DID.

fields.title: Handle
fields.caption: User handle to resolve (e.g. "user.bsky.social")

tools.title: Mute User
tools.description: Mute a user.

fields.title: Actor
fields.caption: Handle or DID of the user to mute

tools.title: Unmute User
tools.description: Unmute a previously muted user.

fields.title: Actor
fields.caption: Handle or DID of the user to unmute

tools.title: Unfollow User
tools.description: Unfollow a user.

fields.title: Follow Uri
fields.caption: URI of the follow record to delete

tools.title: Send Image
tools.description: Send a post with a single image.

fields.title: Text
fields.caption: Text content of the post

fields.title: Image Alt
fields.caption: Alternative text description for the image

fields.title: Profile Identify
fields.caption: Optional handle or DID for the post author

fields.title: Reply To
fields.caption: Optional reply information dict with keys uri and cid

fields.title: Langs
fields.caption: Optional list of language codes

fields.title: Facets
fields.caption: Optional list of facets (mentions, links, etc.)

tools.title: Send Images
tools.description: Send a post with multiple images (up to 4).

fields.title: Text
fields.caption: Text content of the post

fields.title: Image Alts
fields.caption: Optional list of alt text for each image

fields.title: Profile Identify
fields.caption: Optional handle or DID for the post author

fields.title: Reply To
fields.caption: Optional reply information dict with keys uri and cid

fields.title: Langs
fields.caption: Optional list of language codes

fields.title: Facets
fields.caption: Optional list of facets (mentions, links, etc.)

tools.title: Send Video
tools.description: Send a post with a video.

fields.title: Text
fields.caption: Text content of the post

fields.title: Video Alt
fields.caption: Optional alternative text description for the video

fields.title: Profile Identify
fields.caption: Optional handle or DID for the post author

fields.title: Reply To
fields.caption: Optional reply information dict with keys uri and cid

fields.title: Langs
fields.caption: Optional list of language codes

fields.title: Facets
fields.caption: Optional list of facets (mentions, links, etc.)

tools.title: Delete Post
tools.description: Delete a post created by the authenticated user.

fields.title: Uri
fields.caption: URI of the post to delete

tools.title: Follow User
tools.description: Follow a user.

fields.title: Handle
fields.caption: Handle of the user to follow

data.notes: Access your Bluesky social profile, read your timeline, make posts, leave likes, and more.
